attributes.action: An invitation for tea, to Justin Trudeau, PM of Canada from the British PUBLIC.
attributes.additional_details:
Justin is epitome of a GREAT (N.) American Leader. We like that a lot, we can learn & share a lot over tea, not forgetting the digestives. It will be fun!
Parliament to facilitate his arrival, entertainment & dealing with the bigly crowds which will come from afar, biscuits ready in hand to seek a glimpse of this living legend all in honour of his work to Queen, Country & the human race in general, reiterating as a VIP guest of the PUBLIC!!
Parliament please arrange his visit! 
Thank-you!!
attributes.background: The PM of HM the Queens GOV Canada - Justin P. J. Trudeau PC MP is remarkable individual. Evident in his great statesmanship, his compassion & courageousness which has seriously struck a chord! We the people humbly petition his presence be made for a one off nationwide tea party / day of unity.
